getAll.description: Return all pipelines for the object type specified by {objectType}.

get.description: Return a single pipeline object identified by its unique {pipelineId}.

create.description: Create a new pipeline with the provided property values.

update.description: Perform a partial update of the pipeline identified by {pipelineId}.

replace.description: Replace all the properties of an existing pipeline with the values provided.

getAllStages.description: Return all the stages associated with the pipeline identified by {pipelineId}.

getStage.description: Return the stage identified by {stageId} associated with the pipeline identified by {pipelineId}.

createStage.description: Create a new stage associated with the pipeline identified by {pipelineId}.

updateStage.description: Perform a partial update of the pipeline stage identified by {stageId} associated with the pipeline identified by {pipelineId}.

replaceStage.description: Replace all the properties of an existing pipeline stage with the values provided. The updated stage will be returned in the response.

deleteStage.description: Archive the pipeline stage identified by {stageId} associated with the pipeline identified by {pipelineId}.
